name: sok
description:
"sok" is a relaxing puzzle game with simple mechanics.

Game contains 50 handcrafted levels and it's full of ambient sounds made by Chris Zabriskie to make you focus on solving.

Controls: 

  • arrows/swipes to move
  • esc to exit

There is also Android version of the game.
demo: https://play.google.com/store/...
full: https://play.google.com/store/...

Feel free to tell me what you think about the game.
Thanks for playing and support!
